downloadTitle: Security Features in Microsoft Exchange Hosted Services: Technical Overview
downloadDescription: Technical Overview of Security Features in Microsoft Exchange Hosted Services
detailsSection: The Microsoft® Exchange Hosted Services environment is composed of computers, operating systems, applications and services, networks, operations and monitoring equipment, and specialized hardware, along with the administrative and operations staff required to run and maintain the service. The environment also includes the physical operations centers that house the solution and which themselves must be secured against malicious and accidental damage.
installInstructionSection: Download the document to your local computer, and then open it in Microsoft Office Word.
